title: Enhancing Instructional Practice Competencies: Intelligent Tutoring Systems Based on Online Learning Resource Clustering

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis and machine learning concepts, with experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners will explain the density-based outlier detection and removal process for online learning resources
Learners will implement clustering algorithms using Minimum Spanning Tree (MST) structures and apply them to resource grouping
Learners will interpret and utilize clustering results to design intelligent tutoring systems tailored to learner characteristics
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
